text: Demon Seed is a 1977 American science fiction horror movie directed by Donald Cammell and is based on the best selling novel by Dean Koontz. It stars Julie Christie, Fritz Weaver and Lisa Lu and was distributed by MGM. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1977 science fiction movies Category:1977 horror movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:1970s English- language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Pregnancy movies Category:Movies about artificial intelligence Category:Movies about computing Category:Movies set in California Category:MGM movies
title: Demon Seed
